title: Velo’s Predictions for 2024: SRAM Makes Moves, Watch the Women, a Buyer’s Market, and Finding New Gravel
content:
Troy Templin's cycling predictions for 2024 and why we should all remember to have fun and ride more.

Read the full article at Velo’s Predictions for 2024: SRAM Makes Moves, Watch the Women, a Buyer’s Market, and Finding New Gravel on Velo.
author: Troy Templin
